revision.comment: Add images and stock firmware details

{{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=UTM110/120 |revision=(rev 5) |asin=B0096KC88M |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (06/30/2018) |est_release_date=09/2012 |pcb_id=B9309522AB1B400820 |type=network security platform |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=N450 |cpu1_cspeed=1.66 GHz |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Microchip |fla1_model=SST25VF080B |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_model=DDR2 SODIMM |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=WG82583V |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=WG82583V |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WG82583V |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6775F;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, Bus Termination Regulator;Winbond;W8331DG;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;1;,,, 2Kb SPI Serial EEPROM;ON Semiconductor;CAT25020;;4;,,, Intel I/O Controller Hub 8 Mobile;Intel;DW82801HBM;;1;,,, 4A 1MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;Renesas;ISL8014A;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;Texas Instruments;SN74LS14;;1;,,, 64-pin CK505 for Desktop Systems;Renesas;ICS9LP505-1;;1;,,, 30V 58A N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semiconductor;FDD8880;;2;,,, 5A Adjustable LDO Regulator;Niko Semiconductor;L1084DG;;1;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358M;;1;,,, 30V 8A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4411;;2;,,, 5V or 12V Single Synchronous Buck PWM Controller;Renesas;ISL6545;;3;,,, 2A 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1;,,, 30V 10.5A N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;6;,,, Integrated 4A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3842;;2;,,, Integrated 12A Synchronous Buck Regulator;International Rectifier;IR3840;;2;,,, 25V 75A N-Channel Logic Level Mode FET;Niko Semiconductor;P75N02LDG;;1;,,, 6 Channel Bipolar Buffer w/Open-Collector Output;Texas Instruments;SN7407;;1;,,, 7-Bit Programmable Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Controller;ON Semiconductor;ADP3211A;;1; |flags=VGA out, CompactFlash, RTC w/ battery, metal case, power switch, heat sink, buzzer |stock_boot=Bios;American Megatrends;080015; |stock_os=Linux;3.12.48;UTM 9.4; |oui_eth=00:1A:8C }} {{TagLine|Sophos UTM110/120 Firewall}} :[https://community.sophos.com/utm-firewall Support page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' (@1.66GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR2 (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 1MB SPI Serial Flash :CompactFlash Port :2x SATA ports w/320GB SATA Disk *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Sophos UTM110 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos UTM110 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
